amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary of Agriculture by $50,050. As amended by the McHenry amendment (A002), the reduction was increased to $100,100.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the appropriation for the Office of the Secretary by $50,050, or 1%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey amendment (A001) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
